author: Anonymous Beaker
title: m04-raining-eggs-v2-starter.rkt - test thoroughness errors
question:

render-eggs: I would think that the only tests we need is for the empty case, and also a ListOfEgg with at least one Egg in the list (self-referential case? I included three check-expects in total, base case, a list with one egg, and a list with 2 eggs

                         Test thoroughness (known fault detection):             failed to detect fault 1.
place-egg:  I included two check-expects, the first one with place-egg's arguments as an egg and a circle image, and the other with an egg (different x y r values) and MTS
0%  of   2.2%  x       Test thoroughness (known fault detection): incorrect - failed to detect known likely faults.
                           Test thoroughness (known fault detection):             failed to detect fault 1.
instructor_answer: you need to update to the correct starters.  those handin to a different handin point, and will have the correct images.  Right now your thoroughness is failing because your images don't have mario or eggs because of the buggy starters.
